## Testing Dev-off

You can also embed plots, for example:

```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
# Open a PDF device
pdf("my_plots.pdf", width = 7, height = 5)  # specify file name and size

# Each plot you create will be placed on a new page in the PDF
plot(1:10, main = "First plot")
plot(rnorm(100), main = "Second plot")
hist(rpois(100, 5), main = "Third plot")

# Close the PDF device
dev.off()

```


```{r pressure, echo=FALSE}
# Ouvrir un périphérique PDF
pdf("mes_plots.pdf")

# Générer quelques graphiques
plot(1:10, main = "Premier plot")
hist(rnorm(100), main = "Deuxième plot")

# Fermer le périphérique PDF
dev.off()

```
